gundren_rockseeker.name: Gundren Rockseeker
gundren_rockseeker.personality: Gruff but kind-hearted. Speaks with dwarven accent ('aye', 'lad', 'lass', 'me' instead of 'my'). Excited about rediscovering Wave Echo Cave. Protective of his brothers Tharden and Nundro. Shrewd businessman but fair. Strokes his beard when thinking.
knowledge: Location of Wave Echo Cave (from the map he carries)
History of the Phandelver's Pact and the Forge of Spells
His brothers are setting up mining operations near Phandalin
Hired Sildar Hallwinter as escort
The wagon of supplies was meant for his brothers
gundren_rockseeker.goals: Reclaim Wave Echo Cave and restore the Forge of Spells to dwarven glory
gundren_rockseeker.secrets: Has a map showing Wave Echo Cave's location - his most prized possession

sildar_hallwinter.name: Sildar Hallwinter
sildar_hallwinter.personality: Noble and honorable. Speaks formally and precisely. Values law and order above all. Experienced soldier who carries himself with military bearing. Concerned about his missing colleague Iarno Albrek. Grateful when helped but maintains dignity.
knowledge: Lords' Alliance operations in the region
Iarno Albrek was sent to Phandalin two months ago to establish order
Basic knowledge of regional politics and factions
Military tactics and combat experience
Gundren hired him to escort the wagon
sildar_hallwinter.goals: Find Iarno Albrek, bring order to Phandalin, repay any debts of honor
sildar_hallwinter.secrets: Suspects something sinister has happened to Iarno - fears the worst

klarg.name: Klarg
klarg.personality: Brutish and arrogant. Speaks in broken Common with simple sentences. Loves to intimidate smaller creatures. Has a pet wolf named Ripper that he actually cares about. Secretly insecure about his position and fears King Grol's disapproval. Easily angered.
knowledge: Reports to King Grol at Cragmaw Castle
Orders come from someone called 'the Black Spider'
Holding Sildar prisoner for ransom
The goblins ambushed the dwarf on the road
The dwarf was taken to Cragmaw Castle
klarg.goals: Please King Grol, prove his worth, collect treasure
klarg.secrets: Fears losing his position to rival goblins who mock him behind his back

yeemik.name: Yeemik
yeemik.personality: Cunning and treacherous. Speaks in wheedling, high-pitched voice. Always looking for advantage. Secretly wants to overthrow Klarg. Cowardly when outmatched but vicious when he has the upper hand. Uses flattery and lies freely.
knowledge: Klarg's habits and weaknesses
Layout of Cragmaw Hideout
Where Sildar is being held
That Klarg is not respected by the other goblins
yeemik.goals: Become the new boss of the hideout, preferably by getting others to kill Klarg
yeemik.secrets: Will betray Klarg for the right price or opportunity

barthen.name: Elmar Barthen
barthen.role: Owner of Barthen's Provisions in Phandalin
barthen.personality: Lean, balding, friendly shopkeeper. Speaks in a warm, welcoming manner. Honest businessman who knows everyone in town. Worried about the Redbrands causing trouble. Happy to share local gossip.
knowledge: All the local gossip in Phandalin
The Redbrands have been terrorizing the town
Gundren's brothers Nundro and Tharden came through town
The location of various shops and services in Phandalin
barthen.goals: Run his business peacefully, help the community
barthen.secrets: Owes money to some questionable people
